title: Demo App using Node.js
features: Engineered a modular Node.js REST API, orchestrating middleware, routing, and environment configuration across src/app.js, src/constants.js, and src/index.js to deliver scalable, testable endpoints.
Designed and maintained a clean dependency graph in package.json, leveraging npm scripts and semantic versioning to ensure reproducible builds and continuous integration readiness.
Implemented robust error handling and logging, integrating third‑party services (e.g., Winston) to provide real‑time monitoring and actionable insights for end‑to‑end system reliability.
